biotools.summary: CytoTree is an R/Bioconductor package for analysis and visualization of flow and mass cytometry data. CytoTree is an R package to implement cellular subpopulations identification, trajectory inference, pseudotime estimation and visualization for flow and mass cytometry data.

bioschemas.name: CytoTree
bioschemas.summary: CytoTree is an R/Bioconductor package for analysis and visualization of flow and mass cytometry data. CytoTree is an R package to implement cellular subpopulations identification, trajectory inference, pseudotime estimation and visualization for flow and mass cytometry data.
